items.sentence: Tom keeps enough money for a taxi fare home tucked in his sock when he goes out drinking.
I shoot the rabbits in my garden with a squirt gun to keep them away from the vegetables.
The police found Tom lying on the floor with a bullet hole in the middle of his forehead.
Tom and Mary were speaking in French, but switched to English when John entered the room.
I had to change clothes because what I was wearing wasn\'t appropriate for the situation.
